bioAsHtml: Xavier Coulon has been a Java developer for several years, and since he joined JBoss back in late 2011, he has been working on the OpenShift, JAX-RS, LiveReload and Docker components of JBoss Developer Studio and Eclipse. He has also been working on tools.jboss.org using the magic of Awestruct and the freedom on lightweight markup languages. More recently, he started a side-project that involves MongoDB, Lambda Expressions and bytecode manipulation.
